summary: The Duty Drawback Clarification Act aims to amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States. It focuses on establishing a uniform 8-digit subheading for all whiskies, specifically by replacing subheading 2208.30 with a new structure that includes statistical suffixes to categorize whiskies by type (Irish/Scotch, Bourbon, Rye, Other) and container size (under/over 4 liters). The amendments become effective 15 days after enactment.
